languages.text: "Сначала он пытался действовать скрытно и быстро, но его агенты и преданные ему железные жрецы не смогли захватить вожака техноеретиков. И тогда понадобились несокрушимые воины. Мы. Против нашей мощи кэрлы железных жрецов были беспомощны, и мы свершили побиение на разных кораблях и мирах Эксплораторов".

"At first he tried to do everything swiftly and quietly, but his agents and the cog-priests loyal to him failed to capture the leader of the tech-heretics. That's when he realised he needed indestructible warriors. He needed us. The cog-kaerls were powerless against the Wolves' might, and we brought carnage to the Explorators' ships and worlds."
languages.original_text: "Сначала он пытался действовать скрытно и быстро, но его агенты и преданные ему железные жрецы не смогли захватить вожака техноеретиков. И тогда понадобились несокрушимые воины. Мы. Против нашей мощи кэрлы железных жрецов были беспомощны, и мы свершили побиение на разных кораблях и мирах Эксплораторов".

That's when he realised he needed indestructible warriors. He needed us. The cog-kaerls were powerless against the Wolves' might, and we brought carnage to the Explorators' ships and worlds."

That's when he realised he needed indestructible warriors. He needed us. The cog-kaerls were powerless against the Wolves' might, and we brought carnage to the Explorators' ships and worlds."

languages.text: “最开始，他打算偷偷摸摸做好这件事情，不引起任何人注意。然而，他手下的特工和那些忠于他的齿轮神甫没能抓住那群技术异端分子的首领。那个时候，他才意识到，他需要战无不胜的战士，他需要我们。在强大的太空野狼面前，那些满身齿轮的武装农奴毫无还手之力。我们在开拓者的飞船与众多世界上，进行了一场又一场大屠杀。”
languages.original_text: "At first he tried to do everything swiftly and quietly, but his agents and the cog-priests loyal to him failed to capture the leader of the tech-heretics. That's when he realised he needed indestructible warriors. He needed us. The cog-kaerls were powerless against the Wolves' might, and we brought carnage to the Explorators' ships and worlds."

traits.locale_text: “最开始，他打算偷偷摸摸做好这件事情，不引起任何人注意。然而，他手下的特工和那些忠于他的齿轮祭司没能抓住那群技术异端分子的首领。那个时候，他才意识到，他需要战无不胜的战士，他需要我们。在强大的太空野狼面前，那些满身齿轮的武装农奴毫无还手之力。我们在开拓者的飞船与众多世界上，进行了一场又一场大屠杀。”

languages.text: « Dans un premier temps, il a tenté d'agir vite et discrètement, mais ses agents et les technoprêtres qui lui étaient fidèles n'ont pas réussi à attraper le chef des technohérétiques. C'est là qu'il a compris qu'il lui fallait des guerriers invincibles. Il avait besoin de nous. Les technokaerls n'ont rien pu faire face à la puissance des Loups, et nous avons dévasté les vaisseaux et les mondes des Explorators. »
languages.original_text: "At first he tried to do everything swiftly and quietly, but his agents and the cog-priests loyal to him failed to capture the leader of the tech-heretics. That's when he realised he needed indestructible warriors. He needed us. The cog-kaerls were powerless against the Wolves' might, and we brought carnage to the Explorators' ships and worlds."

traits.locale_text: « Dans un premier temps, il a tenté d'agir vite et discrètement, mais ses agents et les technoprêtres qui lui étaient fidèles n'ont pas réussi à attraper le chef des technohérétiques. C'est là qu'il a compris qu'il lui fallait des guerriers invincibles. Il avait besoin de nous. Les technokaerls n'ont rien pu faire face à la puissance des Loups, et nous avons dévasté les vaisseaux et les mondes des Explorators. »

languages.text: 「当初、彼はすべてを迅速かつ静かに実行しようとしたが、彼のエージェントと彼に忠実な歯車の司祭たちは、技術異端のリーダーを捕らえることができなかった。そこで不滅の戦士が必要だと悟った。俺たちの力が必要だったんだ。コグ・カールたちは狼の力の前では無力で、我々はエクスプロレイターの船と惑星に大虐殺をもたらした」
languages.original_text: "At first he tried to do everything swiftly and quietly, but his agents and the cog-priests loyal to him failed to capture the leader of the tech-heretics. That's when he realised he needed indestructible warriors. He needed us. The cog-kaerls were powerless against the Wolves' might, and we brought carnage to the Explorators' ships and worlds."

traits.locale_text: 「当初、彼はすべてを迅速かつ静かに実行しようとしたが、彼のエージェントと彼に忠実な歯車の司祭たちは、技術異端のリーダーを捕らえることができなかった。そこで不滅の戦士が必要だと悟った。俺たちの力が必要だったんだ。コグ・カールたちは狼の力の前では無力で、我々はエクスプロレイターの船と惑星に大虐殺をもたらした」

languages.text: «Al principio intentó hacerlo todo rápido y sin dejar rastro, pero sus agentes y engranasacerdotes leales no llegaron a capturar al líder de los tecnoherejes. Fue entonces cuando se dio cuenta de que necesitaba guerreros indestructibles. Nos necesitaba a nosotros. Los engranakaerls no pudieron hacer nada contra los Lobos, por lo que sembramos una auténtica carnicería en las naves y los mundos de los Exploradores».
languages.original_text: "At first he tried to do everything swiftly and quietly, but his agents and the cog-priests loyal to him failed to capture the leader of the tech-heretics. That's when he realised he needed indestructible warriors. He needed us. The cog-kaerls were powerless against the Wolves' might, and we brought carnage to the Explorators' ships and worlds."

traits.locale_text: «Al principio intentó hacerlo todo rápido y sin dejar rastro, pero sus agentes y engranasacerdotes leales no llegaron a capturar al líder de los tecnoherejes. Fue entonces cuando se dio cuenta de que necesitaba guerreros indestructibles. Nos necesitaba a nosotros. Los engranakaerls no pudieron hacer nada contra los Lobos, por lo que sembramos una auténtica carnicería en las naves y los mundos de los Exploradores».

languages.text: "Zunächst hat er versucht, alles schnell und leise über die Bühne zu bringen, doch seine Agenten und die Zahnradpriester, die ihm treu ergeben waren, konnten den Anführer der Tech-Ketzer nicht gefangen nehmen. Da hat er erkannt, dass er unzerstörbare Krieger braucht. Er hat uns gebraucht. Die Zahnrad-Kaerls waren machtlos gegen die Macht der Wolves, und wir haben auf den Schiffen und Welten der Exploratoren ein Blutbad angerichtet."
languages.original_text: "At first he tried to do everything swiftly and quietly, but his agents and the cog-priests loyal to him failed to capture the leader of the tech-heretics. That's when he realised he needed indestructible warriors. He needed us. The cog-kaerls were powerless against the Wolves' might, and we brought carnage to the Explorators' ships and worlds."

traits.locale_text: "Zunächst hat er versucht, alles schnell und leise über die Bühne zu bringen, doch seine Agenten und die Zahnradpriester, die ihm treu ergeben waren, konnten den Anführer der Tech-Ketzer nicht gefangen nehmen. Da hat er erkannt, dass er unzerstörbare Krieger braucht. Er hat uns gebraucht. Die Zahnrad-Kaerls waren machtlos gegen die Macht der Wolves, und wir haben auf den Schiffen und Welten der Exploratoren ein Blutbad angerichtet."

languages.text: "İlk başta her şeyi sessizce ve bir an önce halletmeye çalıştı ancak casusları ve sadık dişli rahipleri, tekno kâfirlerin liderini ele geçirmeyi başaramadı. İşte o zaman yok edilemez savaşçılara ihtiyacı olduğunu anladı. Bize ihtiyacı vardı. Dişli müstahdemler, Kurtlar'ın kudretine karşı âcizdi. Keşiftör'ün gemilerini ve dünyalarını kıyımdan geçirdik."
languages.original_text: "At first he tried to do everything swiftly and quietly, but his agents and the cog-priests loyal to him failed to capture the leader of the tech-heretics. That's when he realised he needed indestructible warriors. He needed us. The cog-kaerls were powerless against the Wolves' might, and we brought carnage to the Explorators' ships and worlds."
